content: Hi there! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today? Are you dealing with an issue in plumbing, electrical, or heating and cooling?
Uh, I think I’ve got a leak under my sink. Not sure if it’s bad enough for help?
A leak under your sink can get worse over time, so it’s a good idea to have a plumbing professional take a look. Can I get your name to get things started?
Thanks, Ben! Can you please share your address so I can check if you’re in our service area?
Um sure, it’s 859 Meadowbrook Rd, Willow Creek.
Thank you! Let me quickly check if we service your area.

I’m sorry, Ben, but it looks like your address is outside our service area. Unfortunately, I won’t be able to schedule a plumber for you. If you’d like, I can suggest some other local companies that might be able to help. Let me know if you’d like that information.
reason: Customer is outside of service area
